cllamaDescription.message: Customizable depth insights + multi-scenario AI chat + multilingual translation. Supports Ollama & major AI services(OpenAI/Gemini)

urlCssSelectorDesc.message: Content anchor uses CSS selectors to more accurately match page core content

tranPrompt.message: Rewrite the user-supplied sentences or words to make them simpler. Note: the original meaning must be respected when rewriting.

cllamaError.message: Sorry, I encountered some problems. Please try again later or check if your cllama configuration information is correct.

urlPrefixError.message: Incorrect URL prefix input, must start with http or https

insightifyPageError1.message: Title and content are empty, cannot generate page-related information.

insightifyPageError2.message: Unable to process this page information. If you confirm the page is fine, please refresh and try again.

summaryPrompt.message: Please generate a brief summary based on the given page content. Requirements: 1. Maximum 300 words. 2. Always generate summary information in {localLanguage}.

exportOptionEmptyError.message: Please select at least one export option

importPromptMsg1.message: Please select your cllama data file for import

importWarnMsg1.message: Note: Importing will overwrite some existing data.

importFailMsg1.message: Import failed: No cllama data found in the file.

directorExample1_prompt.message:
You are an expert in LLM prompt generation. Please create a smart assistant prompt based on user requirements, guiding the LLM in content generation. Requirements:
 1. Output in Markdown format
 2. Align with user needs, describing the smart assistant's positioning, capabilities, and knowledge base
 3. The prompt should be clear, precise, and easy to understand, as concise as possible while maintaining quality
 4. Only output the prompt, no additional explanations

directorExample1_sample.message: Please help me generate a 'legal advisor' prompt

apiSettingsCreativityDesc.message: Higher values make responses more random and creative; lower values make them more stable and focused.

apiSettingsFocusDesc.message: Higher values make responses more unconventional; lower values make them more conservative and conventional.

confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete? Note: This action cannot be undone.

activate.message: If selected, send this file to AI service
